name: Hard to Sea
description:
Welcome to "Hard to Sea"

This is a Game where you navigate your Ship through the dangerous Sea to reach the Island. The Screens a linked but you can only see one at once. Remeber the route through the Sea and pay attention to the maps orientation.

Controls:

up =↑, w

left = ←, a

down =↓, s

right= →, d

Have fun and thanks for playing.
